text: Game of Thrones might be the most intense show on TV, but it's not always so intense to make it. We imagine the HBO fantasy series can be so wearing that you have to have fun behind the scenes, and that's exactly what it appears this close - knit cast does. If you're still reeling from season seven, then you've got to see some of these hilarious and awkward behind - the - scenes moments in honor of the upcoming ( and final ) season eight.
